pkgmetadata.longdescription: The PulseAudio sound system. This version of the package only changes what is necessary to work around Gentoo Bug 519530, if that doesn't apply to you then keep using the upstream package.

use.flag: Use net-libs/libasyncns for asynchronous name resolution.
Enable the equalizer module. Requires sci-libs/fftw.
Add dev-libs/glib support, for PulseAudio-using programs that require it.
Use sys-auth/rtkit to run at realtime priority.
Install an init.d script to allow running PulseAudio as a system daemon. This comes with a number of caveats and is poorly supported by upstream.
Use media-libs/webrtc-audio-processing to enhance sound quality in supporting applications (echo cancellation, automatic gain control and noise suppression).
Builds a special paravirtualized module for running in a Xen guest.
